attributes.action: Stop public purchasing fireworks due to the harm caused to those who have PTSD
attributes.additional_details: It has been largely reported on the news how this year the police came under attack by fireworks, how ex-servicemen are tormented by flashbacks of war when fireworks are being set off in public. Suffering that needs to stop.
attributes.background: They are causing those suffering from PTSD a great deal of stress and mental anguish. They are causing animals a great deal of stress and mental anguish too.They are being used by unruly elements to attack the Emergency Services. It's vital you listen to the crippling effects caused by fireworks.
